description.value: This extenstion adds another Reference to the Reference datatype to reference the PractitionerRole Resource type.

purpose.value: There's a severe issue throughout FHIR STU3. PractitionerRole came very into being and only a few resources had been updated for it. In FHIR R4 this was fixed and all places where PractitionerRole should have been are covered. In these cases, an extension will contain the reference of the appropriate type. This leads to slight duplication: the original Reference.display will be duplicated into the Reference.extension.valueReference.display. Systems that do not know about the extension would thus still have access to the regular Reference.display.
